SEARCH
Package Distributed.ClientRMI

Interface Client

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientApp
public interface Client extends Remote
Client is an interface which extends Remote and represents a "local" (server side) proxy of the client, called skeleton. It represents the client from the point of view of the RMI server and offers a list of methods which can be called by the server.
